Package org.jsfml.graphics

Class Shader

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.internal.SFMLNativeObject
org.jsfml.graphics.Shader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstShader, Const
public class Shader extends SFMLNativeObject implements ConstShader
Represents a GLSL shader program, consisting of a vertex and a fragment shader.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    Special type denoting that the texture of the object being drawn should be used, which cannot be known before it is actually being drawn.

  • Field Details

    • CURRENT_TEXTURE

      public static final Shader.CurrentTextureType CURRENT_TEXTURE
      Special value denoting that the texture of the object being drawn should be used, which cannot be known before it is actually being drawn.
      See Also:
      • setParameter(String, org.jsfml.graphics.Shader.CurrentTextureType)

  • Constructor Details

    • Shader

      public Shader()
      Constructs a new shader.

  • Method Details

    • bind

      public static void bind(ConstShader shader)
      Activates a shader for rendering.

      This is required only if you wish to use JSFML shaders in custom OpenGL code.

      Parameters:
      shader - the shader to activate, or null to indicate that no shader is to be used.

    • isAvailable

      public static boolean isAvailable()
      Checks if shaders are available on this system.
      Returns:
      true if shaders are available, false otherwise.

    • loadFromSource

      public void loadFromSource(String source, Shader.Type shaderType) throws IOException, ShaderSourceException
      Attempts to load a shader from GLSL source code.
      Parameters:
      source - the GLSL source code.
      shaderType - the shader type.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.
      ShaderSourceException - in case the shader could not be compiled or linked.

    • loadFromSource

      public void loadFromSource(String vertexShaderSource, String fragmentShaderSource) throws IOException, ShaderSourceException
      Attempts to load a shader from GLSL source code.
      Parameters:
      vertexShaderSource - the vertex shader's GLSL source code.
      fragmentShaderSource - the fragment shader's GLSL source code.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.
      ShaderSourceException - in case the shader could not be compiled or linked.

    • loadFromStream

      public void loadFromStream(InputStream in, Shader.Type shaderType) throws IOException, ShaderSourceException
      Fully loads all available bytes from an InputStream and attempts to load the shader from it.
      Parameters:
      in - the input stream to read from.
      shaderType - the shader type.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.
      ShaderSourceException - in case the shader could not be compiled or linked.

    • loadFromStream

      public void loadFromStream(InputStream vertexShaderIn, InputStream fragmentShaderIn) throws IOException, ShaderSourceException
      Fully loads all available bytes from an InputStream and attempts to load the shader from it.
      Parameters:
      vertexShaderIn - the input stream to read the vertex shader from.
      fragmentShaderIn - the input stream to read the fragment shader from.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.
      ShaderSourceException - in case the shader could not be compiled or linked.

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile(Path path, Shader.Type shaderType) throws IOException, ShaderSourceException
      Attempts to load the shader from a file.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file to load.
      shaderType - the shader type.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.
      ShaderSourceException - in case the shader could not be compiled or linked.

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile(Path vertexShaderFile, Path fragmentShaderFile) throws IOException, ShaderSourceException
      Attempts to load the shader from files.
      Parameters:
      vertexShaderFile - the path to the file to read the vertex shader from.
      fragmentShaderFile - the path to the file to read the fragment shader from.
      Throws:
      IOException - in case an I/O error occurs.
      ShaderSourceException - in case the shader could not be compiled or linked.

    • setParameter

      public void setParameter(String name, ConstTexture texture)
      Sets a texture (sampler2D) parameter value in the shader.
      Parameters:
      name - the parameter's name.
      texture - the parameter's value.

    • setParameter

      public void setParameter(String name, Shader.CurrentTextureType currentTexture)
      Sets a texture (sampler2D) parameter value in the shader to the texture of the object being drawn in the moment the shader is applied.

      Since that texture cannot be known before the object is actually being drawn, this overload can be used to tell the shader to use it when applied.

      Parameters:
      name - the parameter's name.
      currentTexture - should be CURRENT_TEXTURE.
